titleStmt.title: F. I Thibault to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1868

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: San Francisco, San Francisco County, California

body.p:
San Francisco California
May 1864.
To His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette.
Governor of the State of Kentucky,
Frankfort.
Dear Sir,

Being desirous of obtaining a reappointment as Commissiner for Kentucky in California. I submit this application to your consideration. I am a Notary Public for the city and county of San Francisco and a Commissioner for all the State and Territories. I have been actively engaged transacting business connected with these commissions for the past eight years, which has given me considerable experience in conveyacing and certifying to papers to be used in the various States and Territories. I am extremely anxious to keep my list of Appointments full, and your conferring the commission will greatly oblige

Yours Very Respectfully
F. I. Thibault

Comr Deeds
California
F. J. Thibault
apptd &
Comd
8th Oct/64
